content.html: A few weeks ago the @FusionAuth team went to @kc_dc. We had a great time chatting with folks, talking #webauthn, discussing dev's #auth challenges, and, oh yeah, feasting on KC BBQ. Here's team members Tharon and Evan preparing to dig in at @jackstackbbq
content.value:
A few weeks ago the @FusionAuth team went to @kc_dc. We had a great time chatting with folks, talking #webauthn, discussing dev's #auth challenges, and, oh yeah, feasting on KC BBQ.

Here's team members Tharon and Evan preparing to dig in at @jackstackbbq

photo.alt: Two people at a restaurant getting ready to eat barbecue.
